name: Mushy Score
description:
Outmaneuver endless waves of enemies for high score!



In this platforming survival arena you collect points and survive long as you can. Play as a cute Mushy who adventures nearby forest and fights for their life. Can you survive long enough to get new high score?

Features:
  • Fast-paced gameplay with different types of enemies.
  • Cute and colorful pixel art game with beautiful backgrounds.
  • Use elemental powers to improve your character
  • Easy to start but the challenge ramps up quickly.
